    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description

    CamEntity2
    An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.

    An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.

    Methods in camzup.pfriendly with annotations of type Experimental
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Up3.beginHud()
    Begins the heads-up display section of the sketch.
    void
    Yup3.camFlipped()
    Sets the camera to the Processing default, where the origin is in the top left corner of the sketch and the y axis points downward.
    void
    Zup3.camFlipped()
    Sets the camera to the Processing default, where the origin is in the top left corner of the sketch and the y axis points downward.
    void
    Up3.endHud()
    Concludes the heads-up display section of the sketch by enabling the depth mask and depth test.
    Vec2
    Yup2.screen(Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
    Finds the screen position of a point in the world.

    More efficient than calling PApplet.screenX(float, float, float) , PApplet.screenY(float, float, float) , and PApplet.screenZ(float, float, float) separately.
    Vec2
    YupJ2.screen(Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
    Finds the screen position of a point in the world.
    float
    YupJ2.screenX(float x, float y)
    Takes a two-dimensional x, y position and returns the x value for where it will appear on a two-dimensional screen.
    float
    YupJ2.screenY(float x, float y)
    Takes a two-dimensional x, y position and returns the y value for where it will appear on a two-dimensional screen.
    void
    YupJ2.text(TextEntity2 entity)
    Draws a 2D text entity.

    Support for textures in this renderer is limited.
    static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL
    Convert.toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, MeshEntity2 source)
    Converts a 2D mesh entity to a PShapeOpenGL.
